meanings.definition: A person who is knowledgeable about good food and drink.
meanings.sent1: The gastronomes at the event shared their favorite recipes.
meanings.sent2: The group of gastronomes gathered to discuss the latest food trends.
meanings.sent3: The gastronomes joked that they could identify any dish blindfolded.
meanings.sent4: She was a true gastronome, able to distinguish the subtlest flavors.
meanings.sent5: The gastronomes' passion for food was evident in every conversation they had.

meanings.sent1: We invited the gastronomes to join us for a culinary tour.
meanings.sent2: The gastronomes' reviews of the restaurant were highly anticipated.
meanings.sent3: The gastronomes' club held a tasting competition last weekend.
meanings.sent4: In the world of gastronomes, every meal is an adventure.
meanings.sent5: The gastronomes' expertise in food made them sought after by many.
